name: Yacht Deluxe HD
description:
*** New Online Daily, Weekly, and Overall High Scores! ***

Yacht Deluxe HD is a new dice game designed exclusively for your iPad. Players take turn rolling five dice to score big with a straight, full house, four of a kind, Yacht, or Chance combination. You may also know this game as Cheerio, Yot, Yam, Yahtzee™, or General.

Yacht Deluxe not only has real dice rolling physics, but takes advantage of your entire ipad screen to show you how all of your dice score and your past dice rolling combinations.

Challenge your friends and family or go head to head with up to 3 clever computer players. Yacht Deluxe also supports Solitaire play, and the option to post your high scores on the global leaderboard.

Graphics, sound effects, and physics bring the dice rolling action to life. Customize your game by naming your human and computer players, choosing from 16 player images, and setting each computer player's difficulty.

Yacht Deluxe HD Features:
-Play versus the computer with up to 3 skilled AI opponents
-Up to 4 human players
-Customize player names and choose from 16 player images
- 3 Levels of computer difficulty
- 3D dice rolling animation based on real physics
- Global Leaderboard of daily, weekly, and overall high scores
- Option to turn dice rolling off to speed up game play
- How to Play and Tips
- Sound effects enhance gaming experience
- Save your game where you left off
- Statistics: keep track of total wins and losses, current winning steak, and average and highest scores.
- Online Scoring: compete against the world for the highest daily, weekly, and all-time scores.

Try Yacht Deluxe Today!

Better Day Wireless. Better Apps. Better Value.
